rates.description: Core Commercial Gas Rate. Based on customer’s highest Average Daily Usage (ADU) determined from among the billing periods occurring within the last twelve months, including current billing period. PG&E calculates the ADU for each billing period by dividing the total usage by the number of days in the billing period
rates.name: Schedule G-NR1

rates.description: Core Commercial Gas Rate. Based on customer’s highest Average Daily Usage (ADU) determined from among the billing periods occurring within the last twelve months, including current billing period. PG&E calculates the ADU for each billing period by dividing the total usage by the number of days in the billing period
rates.name: Schedule G-NR2

rates.description: Customers on this schedule pay a Procurement Charge and a Transportation Charge, per dwelling meter (summer & winter on peak only winter off-peak not implemented)
rates.name: Schedule GM (code W)

rates.description: Customers on this schedule pay a Procurement Charge and a Transportation Charge, per meter. CARE end-use customers recieve a discount (applied in transportation charge) (summer & winter on peak only winter off-peak not implemented)
rates.name: Schedule GML (code W CARE qualifying)

rates.description: Customers on this schedule pay a Procurement Charge and a Transportation Charge, per meter (summer & winter on peak only winter off-peak not implemented)
rates.name: Schedule GS (code W)

rates.description: Customers on this schedule pay a Procurement Charge and a Transportation Charge, per meter (summer & winter on peak only winter off-peak not implemented)
rates.name: Schedule GSL (code W)

rates.description: Applicable to natural gas procurement service to non-residential core customers, including service not provided under any other rate schedule (not space heating only customers)
rates.name: Schedule G10

rates.description: Applicable to natural gas procurement service for Multi-family Accommodations supplying Baseline uses only or in a combination of Baseline uses and common facilities through one meter on a premises, in accordance with the provisions of Rule No. 24 (not space heating only customers).
rates.name: Schedule GM-BE (CZ-2)

rates.description: Applicable to natural gas procurement service for Multi-family Accommodations and Mobilehome Parks supplied through one meter on a single premises and submetered to all individual units in accordance with the provisions of Rule No. 24 (not space heating only customers).
rates.name: Schedule GS (CZ-2)

rates.description: Applicable to natural gas procurement service for Multi-family Accommodations and Mobilehome Parks supplied through one meter on a single premises and submetered to all individual units in accordance with the provisions of Rule No. 24 CARE discount applied (not space heating only customers).
rates.name: Schedule GS CARE (CZ-2)
rates.category: California alternate rates for energy (CARE) program

rates.description: Applicable to natural gas core service for qualifying gas cooling uses, as specified herein, at each Facility classified in Rule No. 23 as Priority 1 and 2A or receiving service under Schedule No. G-10.
rates.name: Schedule G-AC
rates.category: Core air conditioning service for commerical & industrial
